mapper.insert: insert into auction( auction_no, auction_schedule_no, work_no, auction_lot, auction_low_price, auction_high_price, auction_state, auction_consigner, auction_consignment_fee, auction_start_price, auction_bid_price, auction_bid_increment ) values( #{auctionNo}, #{auctionScheduleNo}, #{workNo}, (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(auction_lot), 0) + 1 FROM auction WHERE auction_schedule_no = #{auctionScheduleNo}), #{auctionLot}, #{auctionLowPrice}, #{auctionHighPrice}, #{auctionState}, #{auctionConsigner}, #{auctionConsignmentFee}, #{auctionStartPrice}, #{auctionStartPrice}, #{auctionBidIncrement} )
mapper.select: select * from auction order by auction_no asc
select * from auction where auction_schedule_no = #{auctionScheduleNo} order by auction_no asc

SELECT A.AUCTION_NO,A.AUCTION_LOT,A.AUCTION_STATE,W.work_title,W.WORK_MATERIALS ,W.WORK_CATEGORY FROM work W INNER JOIN auction A ON W.work_no = A.work_no WHERE A.AUCTION_SCHEDULE_NO = #{auctionScheduleNo} order by A.AUCTION_NO asc
mapper.update: update auction set auction_state='출품취소' where auction_no = #{auctionNo}
update auction set auction_state='예정경매' where auction_no = #{auctionNo}
mapper.select: select * from work W inner join auction AU on W.work_no = AU.work_no inner join artist AR on W.artist_no = AR.artist_no where AU.AUCTION_NO =#{auctionNo}
select count(*) from auction where auction_no=#{auctionNo} and auction_bid_price=#{auctionBidPrice}
